title: The Boss
description:
Men of Hidden Justice
Because love can bleed into the darkest heart
Terrified and on the run, I was lost.He found me.I witnessed his crime and he gave me a choice.Marriage or death.I never expected to love him.But the choices were never really mine.Could this avenging angel of death ever love me back?His touch consumed me.Did my heart stand a chance?Previously published on Book+Main and in Take Me To Bed Collection. New added content for a complete romantic suspense experience.
author: Melanie Moreland
